attributes.action: consider waiving all delivery fees for supermarkets online shopping sites if an individual is registered disabled or in receipt of Disability Living Allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charging disabled people to have shopping delivered to their homes when they have no other way of ensuring weekly shops are done is something that supermarkets should strongly consider waiving

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
